Vahli Dikri Yojana.details: Launched by the Women and Child Development Department, Government of Gujarat, this scheme aims to empower girl children by providing financial assistance to their parents. It encourages families to educate and nurture their daughters by offering cash incentives, free education, and insurance coverage.
benefits: Cash incentives at different stages of education
application_process: Apply through the official portal or designated centers

Vandan Matru Yojana.details: A maternity benefit scheme launched by the Women and Child Development Department, Gujarat, to support pregnant and lactating women from economically weaker sections. The scheme emphasizes maternal nutrition, encourages institutional deliveries, and promotes breastfeeding practices.
benefits: Financial assistance in stages during pregnancy, delivery, and breastfeeding period
eligibility: Pregnant and lactating women from economically weaker sections in Gujarat

PURNA Scheme.details: A comprehensive initiative designed for adolescent girls aged 15-18 in Gujarat, focusing on improving their nutritional status, health, and life skills while empowering them through education, vocational training, and exposure to public services.
eligibility: Adolescent girls aged 15-18 residing in Gujarat

Mahila Swavlamban Scheme.details: Aims to empower women by providing financial assistance for starting or expanding economic activities. This initiative targets women from rural and urban areas, especially those from families living below the poverty line.
benefits: Subsidy and loan to support economic development
eligibility: Women from rural and urban areas in Gujarat
Families living below the poverty line

Ganga Swarupa Pension Scheme.details: Aims to empower widowed women by offering financial support, ensuring they achieve self-reliance and dignity. Eligible beneficiaries receive a monthly pension directly deposited into their Post Office accounts.

Bal Sakha Yojana.details: A community-based program that aims to provide support to children in need of care and protection. Implemented by the Department of Women and Child Development in collaboration with the NHM and the State Child Protection Society.
benefits: Support for children in need of care and protection
Network of trained volunteers called 'Bal Sakhis'
eligibility: Children in need of care and protection in Gujarat
application_process: Assessment and provision of support services

Poshan Sudha.details: A scheme launched by the Women and Child Development Department, Gujarat, aimed at providing nutritional support to pregnant and lactating women.
benefits: Nutritional support to pregnant and lactating women
eligibility: Pregnant and lactating women residing in Gujarat
application_process: Await verification and provision of nutritional support

Mukhyamantri Matrushakti Yojana.details: Launched in 2022 by the Women and Child Development Department, Gujarat, focuses on improving the health and nutrition of pregnant women and mothers with children under 2 years. The scheme offers a nutritional kit containing groundnut oil, tuver dal, and chana to support calorie and protein needs.
benefits: Nutritional kit containing essential food items
eligibility: First-time pregnant women or mothers with children aged under two years residing in Gujarat
application_process: Register using Aadhaar number and other required details on the official portal
Collect the nutritional kit from the nearest Anganwadi center upon verification
